long_description: This definitive trail guide is the second of two 75th Anniversary volumes describing the statewide Blue-Blazed Hiking Trails. Compiled by the Connecticut Forest and Park Association. Softcover (binder-style); 353 pages; black-and-white photos; pull-out maps. The Connecticut Forest and Park Association: copyright 2005. Find clear, updated trail maps created from on-the-ground GPS data. Learn about 400 miles of hiking trails in central and western Connecticut. Read comprehensive descriptions of two dozen Blue-Blazed Hiking Trails, from Hartland to Redding and New Haven to Kent. Find engaging commentary on trail legends and lore, and fascinating facts about the geology and natural history of the trails.
short_description: This definitive trail guide is the second of two 75th Anniversary volumes describing the statewide Blue-Blazed Hiking Trails.
